Content:
There is a trend that I consider to be from Japanese anime or something like that where sharp, harsh lines and high-contrast colors are replacing smooth, sweeping curves and graceful tonal transitions or single colors. It pushes me away from most new motorcycle designs and towards what might be called a classic look.

Aerodynamic design used to lead designers into smooth contours, but now something is driving these sharp edges and abruptly contrasting color accents. I'll take vintage over modern every time.

I made this picture to illustrate what I think of as a wrong direction in design... and why.

Obviously gentle curves are more appealing to me than sharp angles.
